title: Azir soldiers bugged?
body: anyone else been having a problem with azirs soldier attack range being bugged, i can't play azir anymore, whenever his soliders go to attack a target I'm forced to move toward the soldier until im directly next to the solider attack range cirlce (basically meaning i have to be in azirs standard attack range not the soldiers) and i had no control over the movement of azir himself unless i cancelled the attack so if i all in someone i could literally not dodge a single skillshot at all which as you can imagine is very annoying, anyone else have this problem?

replies.body:
for me its just randomly walk to a random point on the map when i attack, it is a known issue and riot does indeed know about it but not a priority fix as they said azir usually inputs alot of commands to cancel movement anyway so maybe next patch?

but yea its a pain in the butt i know, really screws you up sometimes in intense situations!
